body_content.value:
Made from natural minerals, sea-salts, and cold pressed virgin oils. Miracle II products are all atural, non-toxic and biodegradable. We add no fragrances, colors, agents or perfumes.

“The formula for Miracle II was given to me in 1980. It was perfected then and has not changed since. You will never read “New and Improved” on a bottle of Miracle II products.”

Clayton Tedeton, God’s Faithful Servant

heading_content.value: Miracle II Family of Products

subheading_content.value: EACH PRODUCT IS MIRACULOUS IN ITS OWN WAY
